name: SANSULIN M30 INJEKSI
efeksamping: Hypoglycemia; over-sweating, dizziness, trembling, sensation of hunger, anxiety, tingling sensation in hands, feet & lips or tongue, concentraton disturbances, sleepiness, sleep disturbances, loss of self-control, mydriasis, visual disorders, speech disturbances, depression, impaired reactions, headache, restlessness, palpitaion. Hyperglycemia; prolonged hyperglycemia leads to ketoacidosis & diabetic coma. Post-insulin lipodystrophy, allergy & insulin resistance.
kemasan: Sansulin M30 susp for injeksi x 3 ml x 5 x 1's
